action.action-desc: Mr. Casten (for himself and Mr. Burchett) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Educators Expense Deduction Modernization Act of 2023.

section.header: Increase in deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers

subsection.text: Section 62(a)(2)(D) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking elementary and secondary school teachers in the heading and inserting eligible educators, and

subsection.text: Section 62(d)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking calendar year 2014 and inserting calendar year 2022.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to taxable years beginning December 31, 2022.
